{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3009631,"name":"vargoose84","username":"vargoose84","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/vargoose84/{size}/165453_2.png","created_at":"2022-02-18T22:31:15.353Z","cooked":"

I understand I can build this myself but why reinvent the wheel, but has anyone compiled a field drawing cheat sheet? I want to know the x y coordinates of all the cargo, the tarmac vertices, the hangar placement and the rotation of the four corners of the hub. We’ll be using this data for path planning.

I posted in the below topic, but I think this is separate enough of a topic where it may warrant its own thread.

2022 Team Version Field Drawings?

This is what we made for our Ball placementBall Layout.pdf (408.6 KB)
